qas.question: Who introduced Nasser and his wife?
Where did Nasser and his wife live after they were married?
What job of Nasser's offered him a comparably comfortable lifestyle?

context: In 1944, Nasser married <a0_0>Tahia Kazem<a0_0/>, the 22-year-old daughter of a wealthy Iranian father and an Egyptian mother, both of whom died when she was young. She was introduced to Nasser through her brother, <a1_0>Abdel Hamid Kazim<a1_0/>, a merchant friend of Nasser's, in 1943. After their wedding, the couple moved into a house in <a2_0>Manshiyat al-Bakri<a2_0/>, a suburb of Cairo, where they would live for the rest of their lives. Nasser's entry into the <a3_0>officer corps<a3_0/> in 1937 secured him relatively well-paid employment in a society where most people lived in poverty.
